I was shown that it is wrong to use the tithe for defraying the incidental expenses of the church. In this there has been a departure from correct 


                      -7- 

methods. It would be far better to dress less expensively, cut down your indulgences, practise self-denial, and meet these outgoings. By so doing you will have a clear conscience. But you are robbing God every time that you put your hands into the treasury for funds to meet the running expenses of the church.
